body:
Hello,


Apologies for asking something that is not directly related to the radiance
software.


I wish to know field experiences of using high dynamic range (HDR)
photography for interior lighting quality assessment. Can anyone please
point me to the right direction of resources?


Regards,


Tanvir








*Ar Tanvir Morshed  *

UK)*
